Articles.Content:
Hello all,

I started playing KSP a few weeks ago, and after a few runs in the demo moved to career mode in the full version. So far I've managed to land and return from the Mun, Minmus, and Duna. I stranded poor Bill Kerman on Eve, so my current goal is to do a rescue for him.

I've been doing an in-character writeup of my adventures here. Feel free to drop by and enjoy the story.
Hello TheSquirrelPatrol, and welcome to our community. By the way, this forum has a sub-section for mission reports, if you'd like to post them where other players can find them easily.
